trait.name: Keen Hearing
entries: The Nev'uto has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing.

trait.name: Ice Hide
entries: The Nev'uto has disadvantage on attack rolls against fire-based creatures or when in hot environments.

trait.name: One with Ice
entries: The Nev'uto is indistinguishable from ice or snow while motionless and outside of combat.

trait.name: Frost Regeneration
entries: The Nev'uto regains 1d4 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point and isn't in an area of fire damage or a hot environment.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Nev'uto makes two attacks: one with its claws and one with its ice spikes.

action.name: Claws
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +1 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (2d4 + 1) slashing.

action.name: Ice Spikes
entries: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 30 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d4 + 5) piercing. The Nev'uto fires a barrage of icy spikes at its enemy.

action.name: War Cry (1/day)
entries: The Nev'uto emits a chilling war cry. Up to three allied Nev'uto within 30 ft. that can hear it immediately enter a Fury state, transforming into a Fury of Nev'uto, or regain all their hit points if already in Fury form.

trait.name: Keen Hearing
entries: The Fury of Nev'uto has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing.

trait.name: Ice Hide
entries: The Fury of Nev'uto has disadvantage on attack rolls against fire-based creatures or when in hot environments.

trait.name: Swarm
entries: The Fury of Nev'uto can occupy another creature's space and vice versa. The Fury can also move through any opening large enough for a Tiny creature.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Fury of Nev'uto makes two melee attacks with its claws.

action.name: Claws
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 18 (6d4) slashing, or 9 (3d4) slashing if the target has half its hit points or fewer.

action.name: Ice Torrent (Recharge 4-6)
entries: The Fury of Nev'uto releases a line of icy spikes 40 ft. long and 5 ft. wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw, taking 23 (6d4 + 5) piercing damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.

action.name: War Cry (1/day)
entries: The Fury of Nev'uto emits a chilling war cry. All allied Nev'uto within 30 ft. that can hear it regain all their hit points or transform into their Fury form if possible.
